      • uriMatches

        public static <T> ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> uriMatches​(java.lang.String expression)
        Builds criteria to match uri of a response.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of response body
        Parameters:
        expression - is a substring that uri of a response is supposed to have. It is possible to pass reg exp pattern that uri should fit.
        Returns:
        criteria.
